examples.input: Generate a JSON array of User Request -> AI Response samples of the form { userRequest: string, aiResponse: Ticket } and each Ticket object is of the form { issue: string, severity: "low"|"medium"|"high" }

output.userRequest: My account was locked and I can’t log in anymore.
Notifications stopped working after the last update.
The app crashes whenever I try to upload a file.

examples.input: Generate a JSON array of User Request -> AI Response samples of the form { userRequest: string, aiResponse: ActionItem } and each ActionItem object is of the form { owner: string, action: string, due: string|null }

output.userRequest: Maria will send the updated proposal by Friday.
Someone should check with IT about the login outage.

aiResponse.action: check with IT about login outage

output.userRequest: I’ll follow up with legal tomorrow morning.

examples.input: Generate a JSON array of User Request -> AI Response samples of the form { userRequest: string, aiResponse: ReviewSummary } and each ReviewSummary object is of the form { pros: string[], cons: string[], sentiment: "negative"|"neutral"|"positive" }

output.userRequest: The camera quality is amazing, but the battery barely lasts a day.
Fast performance, great screen, and the battery easily lasts all day.
The app is slow and crashes constantly. Totally unusable.

input: Generate a JSON array of User Request -> AI Response samples of the form { userRequest: string, aiResponse: %%%TYPE_NAME%%% } and each %%%TYPE_NAME%%% object is of the form %%%TYPE_SCHEMA%%%
